user_input: Run the TYNDP 2026 scenarios for Hydrid Heat Pumps. Hydrogen is the complement. Run full study all years, all climates, full split
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

tasks.description: Locate and read the base TYNDP 2026 scenario(s) relevant to Hybrid Heat Pumps within the model, including associated year and climate set configurations and any standard run templates.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the most appropriate {entity_type} from the following list. Prioritize TYNDP 2026 study scenarios that include Heat Pumps or demand-side technology configurations suitable for Hybrid Heat Pumps.

tasks.description: Clone the discovered TYNDP 2026 base scenario into a new scenario named 'TYNDP 2026 - Hybrid Heat Pumps (H2 complement) - FullSplit AllYears AllClimates', copying memberships, properties, and attributes from the source.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the most appropriate {entity_type} from the following list. Ensure the cloned scenario is created under the same study/model and inherits relevant links.

tasks.description: Update memberships for the cloned scenario to include all study years and all climate sets defined in the model (e.g., link to 'All Years' horizon set and 'All Climates' ensemble).
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the most appropriate {entity_type} from the following list. Choose the canonical 'All Years' and 'All Climates' collections where available.

tasks.description: Update scenario properties to: enable Hybrid Heat Pumps, set Complement Carrier to Hydrogen, and apply Full Split across the intended dimensions (technology/region/time) in line with TYNDP 2026 specifications.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the most appropriate {entity_type} from the following list. Map model-specific property names (e.g., Hybrid Heat Pump toggle, Complement Carrier, Split Mode) to the cloned scenario.

tasks.description: Update run-level attributes on the cloned scenario to execute a Full Study across all years and climates, ensuring full enumeration (no sampling) and enabling any required solver/study controls.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the most appropriate {entity_type} from the following list. Target the cloned scenario's run configuration attributes (e.g., Simulation Type, Climate Handling, Enumeration settings).

tasks.description: Read back key memberships, properties, and attributes to confirm the scenario is configured for Hybrid Heat Pumps with Hydrogen complement, Full Split, All Years, and All Climates.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the most appropriate {entity_type} from the following list. Verify that settings match the intended configuration.
